name: Ornn
subtitle: The Fire below the Mountain
description: Ornn is the Freljordian spirit of forging and craftsmanship. He works in the solitude of a massive smithy, hammered out from the lava caverns beneath the volcano Hearth-Home. There he stokes bubbling cauldrons of molten rock to purify ores and fashion items of unsurpassed quality. When other deities—especially Volibear—walk the earth and meddle in mortal affairs, Ornn arises to put these impetuous beings back in their place, either with his trusty hammer or the fiery power of the mountains themselves.

abilities.name: Living Forge
abilities.description:
Ornn gains an additional bonus Armor and Magic Resistance from all sources.

Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, he can create masterwork items for himself and for his allies.

abilities.name: Volcanic Rupture
abilities.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.

abilities.name: Bellows Breath
abilities.description: Ornn advances, breathing fire. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.

abilities.name: Searing Charge
abilities.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
